meanings.sent1: The spilth from the picnic was left on the ground.
meanings.sent2: Please clean up the spilth in the corner of the room.
meanings.sent3: The raccoons found the spilth from the garbage can quite appealing.
meanings.sent4: The spilth of broken dreams littered the abandoned warehouse.
meanings.sent5: The spilth of old newspapers created a musty smell in the attic.

meanings.sent1: Be careful not to spilth the water while pouring.
meanings.sent2: I accidentally spilthed some paint on the floor.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy seemed to enjoy spilthing his food everywhere.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter spilthed out uncontrollably during the comedy show.
meanings.sent5: The wind spilthed the leaves across the yard in a swirling dance.

meanings.sent1: The spilth of the broken vase lay scattered on the floor.
meanings.sent2: The spilth of the factory's production process polluted the river.
meanings.sent3: The children's playground was covered in spilth from the overturned trash cans.

meanings.sent5: The spilth of discarded food attracted a flock of hungry birds.
